blockquote.p: code: Persons who have previously completed or withdrawn from this study or any other study investigating xanomeline TTS or the oral formulation of xanomeline.
code: Use of any investigational agent or approved Alzheimer’s therapeutic medication within 30 days prior to enrollment into the study.
code: Serious illness which required hospitalization within 3 months of screening.
code: Stroke or vascular dementia documented by clinical history and/or radiographic findings interpretable by the investigator as indicative of these disorders
code: Seizure disorder other than simple childhood febrile seizures
code: Severe head trauma resulting in protracted loss of consciousness within the last 5 years, or multiple episodes of head trauma
code: Episode of depression meeting DSM-IV criteria within 3 months of screening.
code: A history within the last 5 years of Schizophrenia.
code: A history within the last 5 years of Bipolar Disease.
code: A history within the last 5 years of Ethanol or psychoactive drug abuse or dependence.
code: A history of syncope within the last 5 years.
code: Evidence from ECG recording of Left bundle branch block.
code: Evidence from ECG recording of Bradycardia ≤50 beats per minute
code: Evidence from ECG recording of Sinus pauses >2 seconds
code: Evidence from ECG recording of Second or third degree heart block unless treated with a pacemaker
code: Evidence from ECG recording of Wolff-Parkinson-White syndrome
code: Evidence from ECG recording of Sustained supraventricular tachyarrhythmia including SVT≥10 sec, atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter.
code: Evidence from ECG recording of Ventricular tachycardia at a rate of ≥120 beats per minute lasting ≥10 seconds.
code: A history within the last 5 years of Clinically significant arrhythmia
code: A history within the last 5 years of Symptomatic sick sinus syndrome not treated with a pacemaker
code: A history within the last 5 years of Congestive heart failure refractory to treatment
code: A history within the last 5 years of Angina except angina controlled with PRN nitroglycerin
code: A history within the last 5 years of Resting heart rate <50 or >100 beats per minute, on physical exam
code: A history within the last 5 years of Uncontrolled hypertension.
code: A history within the last 5 years of a serious gastrointestinal disorder

text.value: Persons who have previously completed or withdrawn from this study or any other study investigating xanomeline TTS or the oral formulation of xanomeline.
Use of any investigational agent or approved Alzheimer’s therapeutic medication within 30 days prior to enrollment into the study.
Serious illness which required hospitalization within 3 months of screening.
Stroke or vascular dementia documented by clinical history and/or radiographic findings interpretable by the investigator as indicative of these disorders
Seizure disorder other than simple childhood febrile seizures
Severe head trauma resulting in protracted loss of consciousness within the last 5 years, or multiple episodes of head trauma
Parkinson’s disease
Multiple sclerosis
Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
Myasthenia gravis
Episode of depression meeting DSM-IV criteria within 3 months of screening.
A history within the last 5 years of Schizophrenia.

Evidence from ECG recording of Ventricular tachycardia at a rate of ≥120 beats per minute lasting ≥10 seconds.
A history within the last 5 years of Clinically significant arrhythmia
A history within the last 5 years of Symptomatic sick sinus syndrome not treated with a pacemaker
A history within the last 5 years of Congestive heart failure refractory to treatment
A history within the last 5 years of Angina except angina controlled with PRN nitroglycerin
A history within the last 5 years of Resting heart rate <50 or >100 beats per minute, on physical exam

A history within the last 5 years of a serious gastrointestinal disorder
